name: Mimicry Protocol
intro: Decentralized derivatives protocol for NFT collections
introduce: Mimicry is a decentralized derivatives protocol for NFT collections. Mimics are fully-collateralized derivative tokens on Polygon that leverage oracles to mirror the appraised price NFT collections. Anyone can mint new Mimics using the Mimicry platform. Mimics are collateralized by ERC-20 tokens. Network participants may collateralize their positions using the Mimicry Network Token ($MIME) to receive rewards.
